ns9:component-version-script.script:
mkdir -p /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ touch /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ec2.json
echo chef_server_url \"$chef_server_url$chef_server_organization\" > /etc/chef/client.rb echo validation_client_name \"$chef_server_organization-validator\" >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo ssl_verify_mode :verify_peer >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo log_level :info >> /etc/chef/client.rb
if [ ! -e /etc/chef/appd.json ]; then echo {} > /etc/chef/appd.json fi
wget -O /etc/chef/validation.pem $validation_key

echo chef_server_url \"$chef_server_url$chef_server_organization\" > /etc/chef/client.rb echo validation_client_name \"$chef_server_organization-validator\" >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo ssl_verify_mode :verify_peer >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo log_level :info >> /etc/chef/client.rb

wget -O /etc/chef/validation.pem $validation_key

task.content:
mkdir -p /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ touch /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ec2.json
echo chef_server_url \"$chef_server_url$chef_server_organization\" > /etc/chef/client.rb echo validation_client_name \"$chef_server_organization-validator\" >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo ssl_verify_mode :verify_peer >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo log_level :info >> /etc/chef/client.rb
if [ ! -e /etc/chef/appd.json ]; then echo {} > /etc/chef/appd.json fi
wget -O /etc/chef/validation.pem $validation_key

mkdir -p /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ touch /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ec2.json
echo chef_server_url \"$chef_server_url$chef_server_organization\" > /etc/chef/client.rb echo validation_client_name \"$chef_server_organization-validator\" >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo ssl_verify_mode :verify_peer >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo log_level :info >> /etc/chef/client.rb
if [ ! -e /etc/chef/appd.json ]; then echo {} > /etc/chef/appd.json fi
wget -O /etc/chef/validation.pem $validation_key

mkdir -p /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ touch /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ec2.json
echo chef_server_url \"$chef_server_url$chef_server_organization\" > /etc/chef/client.rb echo validation_client_name \"$chef_server_organization-validator\" >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo ssl_verify_mode :verify_peer >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo log_level :info >> /etc/chef/client.rb
if [ ! -e /etc/chef/appd.json ]; then echo {} > /etc/chef/appd.json fi
wget -O /etc/chef/validation.pem $validation_key

mkdir -p /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ touch /etc/chef/ohai/hints/ec2.json
echo chef_server_url \"$chef_server_url$chef_server_organization\" > /etc/chef/client.rb echo validation_client_name \"$chef_server_organization-validator\" >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo ssl_verify_mode :verify_peer >> /etc/chef/client.rb echo log_level :info >> /etc/chef/client.rb
if [ ! -e /etc/chef/appd.json ]; then echo {} > /etc/chef/appd.json fi
wget -O /etc/chef/validation.pem $validation_key
